name: ABC Animal Sounds
description:
Have fun with your family while you are learning the Alphabets using the Animal's names. Let all of you learn new animals and bird's names, See their photos and hear their sounds. 

Notes: 

-Tap any animal/bird button and you will hear its sound 

-Long Tap any button to open the big photo for that animal/bird where you will have more control 

*From the big Photo page you can Play the sound of the animal/bird once you tap the photo 

*You can set the photo as a Lockscreen for your device 

*You can Share the Photo *You can also set the current animal/bird sound as a ringtone for your device....
